title: OntarioWriter
author: OntarioWriter
content: Hello, I’m Christian Holmes. Since 2012, I’ve been a freelance copywriter and editor for dozens of clients. In that time, I’ve written and proofreaded thousands of articles covering numerous subjects. This includes cryptocurrency and blockchain. Additionally, I’ve written extensively about online gambling and international sports. This has allowed me to maintain long-term working relationships with numerous clients. However, I'm looking to expand my customer base in 2023. You’ll find my rates are reasonable at USD 0.02, with PayPal being the platform of choice for payment. I’ve provided content examples via Google Docs. I’m happy to provide additional examples through email by request. Additionally, I’ve provided an author profile link with my former client, EarlyGame. Please feel free to read through my samples, and thank you for your consideration.  EarlyGame Author Profile:https://earlygame.com/authors/christian-holmesCryptocurrency Content Examples:https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1LP5iExjGdbzQkzAS9TJit8irkRu_F0Y7?usp=sharingOnline Gambling Content Examples:https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1jlZTOtxYXdA263v96hM62sd1mdkGfKwy?usp=sharingInternational Sport Content Examples:https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1NW4Ya4kxw0-MCzaqZWnmyJ_dltkbQ2uh?usp=sharingVideo Game Content Examples:https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1T8YkO5uDfJ2TWcDqvDopI2jQLvDKCIvQ?usp=sharingGeneral Content Examples:https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/103fpVJS6_9840EC7Kix8qokH5aZwChXJ?usp=sharingPlease feel free to contact me via Email or Skype.Email: Christianholmescontentservices@gmail.comSkype: live:.cid.352e638646b99fb0
